DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine objective response rate irinotecan trastuzumab patient stage IV colorectal cancer p185 HER2 overexpression . II . Evaluate safety toxic effect treatment regimen patient . III . Determine overall survival time progression patient response treatment regimen . IV . Determine pharmacokinetics trastuzumab combination irinotecan antibody trastuzumab patient . V. Determine expression HER2/neu patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive load dose trastuzumab IV 90 minute week 1 , 30-90 minute weekly thereafter . Patients receive irinotecan IV 90 minute follow trastuzumab weekly 4 week . Courses repeat every 6 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month .
